
This post shows how to append the USSC logo to `ggplot2` graphs.

```{r}
library('ussc')
library('tidyverse')

# set up the ggplot2 object
p1 <- ggplot(mtcars) +
  geom_point(aes(mpg, disp, color = cyl), show.legend = FALSE) + 
  facet_grid(~cyl) + 
  scale_colour_ussc(discrete = FALSE) + 
  labs(title = "Halis",
       caption = "AbcXyz") + 
  theme_ussc()
```

Overlay the logo as follows:

```{r}
plot_ussc_logo(p1)
```
